awd_titl_txt: IUTAM Symposium on Nonlinear Hydrodynamic Stability and     Transition, to be held at the Universite de Nice-Sophia-    Antipolis, France on September 3-8, 1990.
awd_abstract_narration: Travel support is to be granted to a selected number of US                      participants invited to give presentations at a Symposium on                    Nonlinear Hydrodynamic Stability and Transition, to be held in                  France on September 3 - 8, 1990.  Younger and less known                        participants are targeted for support.                                                                                                                          The symposium is sponsored by the International Union of                        Theoretical and Applied Mechanics, and the support from NSF is                  shared by a variety of other sources.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA
